title: Engraving of a family of four - evidence of

content.question: The drawing above has been cited as evidence of the nineteenth-century middle-class view of the

choices.label: home as a refuge from the world rather than as a productive unit
declining influence of women in the family structure
economic value of children to families
widening role of women in society

content.answer: home as a refuge from the world rather than as a productive unit

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
